overview: The ultimate collection of horror videos that carefully select and introduce the psychic images that are about to be born from the darkness and buried in the darkness! " Watermelon" A man and a woman who test their liver at the foot of a mountain where distress accidents often occur. I wonder if the mysterious person who has been passed on to the video is called "Watermelon"...? / "Black man under the bridge" A black shadow sneaks up to the dance team practicing dancing under the bridge. It is said that the contributor may have called an existence called Shadow People... / "Eat memory" A couple who tests their courage in an abandoned village deep in the mountains. Even though he encountered a horrible existence, he went home as if he had forgotten it... In addition, several horror psychic images are included.
title: Tokyo Videos of Horror 64
